title: Mabby the Squirrel's Guide to Flying: Book one of the Elderwood Chronicles: A young adult fantasy adventure series with talking animals and life lessons for all ages.
description: Embark on a breathtaking journey to Hesperia, the realm where the Hundred Trees whisper secrets of prosperity, and the Brambleries conceal shared struggles and communal aspirations. Delve deep into the bond between a father and son, a connection that will unearth the enigmatic shadows of their family's haunting past—a past entwined with a clandestine society of squirrels wielding extraordinary powers. Can they shatter the shackles of societal norms and seize the dream of achieving ultimate awesomeness and major air-time? Prepare to be spellbound by a charming adventure of soaring dreams, unexpected alliances, and the indomitable spirit of youth. Mabby's remarkable journey challenges the very fabric of convention, beckoning readers to spread their wings and explore the limitless realms of imagination.If you were captivated by the wizardry of Harry Potter or the epic adventures of Percy Jackson, then brace yourself for a fantasy that promises an exhilarating odyssey that is “…worthy of the pen of T.H. White, acclaimed author of the Once and Future King” (The U.S. Review of Books.) Take flight into uncharted territories and embrace the extraordinary alongside Dorma, Mabby, and their intrepid companions in "Mabby the Squirrel's Guide to Flying!" Your wildest dreams are about to take flight!
author: Matthew  Claybrook
